energy_use_predicted_net.description: Predicted net energy use in kBTU
energy_use_predicted_net.title: Energy Use Predicted Net

energy_use_predicted_gross.description: Predicted gross energy use in kBTU
energy_use_predicted_gross.title: Energy Use Predicted Gross

GWP_bio_total.title: Gwp Bio Total

GWP_bio_emissions.title: Gwp Bio Emissions

GWP_bio_storage.description: Total GWP biogenic storage in kg CO2e
GWP_bio_storage.title: Gwp Bio Storage

GWP_total.description: Total quantity (in kg CO2e) of GWP
GWP_total.title: Gwp Total

GWP_fossil.description: Total quantity (in kg CO2e) of GWP fossil
GWP_fossil.title: Gwp Fossil

GWP_luluc.description: Total quantity (in kg CO2e) of GWP luluc
GWP_luluc.title: Gwp Luluc

GWP_bio_total.description: Total quantity (in kg CO2e) of GWP biogenic
GWP_bio_total.title: Gwp Bio Total

GWP_bio_emissions.title: Gwp Bio Emissions

GWP_bio_storage.title: Gwp Bio Storage

AP_total.description: Total quantity (in kg SO2e) of AP (acidification potential of land and water).
AP_total.title: Ap Total

EP_total.description: Total quantity (in kg PO4e) of EP (eutrophication potential).
EP_total.title: Ep Total

ODP_total.description: Total quantity (kg CFC-11e) of ODP (ozone depletion potential).
ODP_total.title: Odp Total

POCP_total.description: Total quantity (kg C2H4e) of POCP (photochemical ozone creation potential, aka photochemical smog potential).
POCP_total.title: Pocp Total

ADP_total.description: Total quantity (kg Sbe) of ADP (abiotic depletion potential).
ADP_total.title: Adp Total

CED_total.description: Total quantity (MJ) of CED (cumulative energy demand).
CED_total.title: Ced Total

A1_A3.description: Life Cycle Stage A1-A3 Product Stage

A5_total.description: Life Cycle Stage A5 Construction Installation Process

A5p1.description: Life Cycle Stage A5.1 Pre-Construction Demolition includes Demolition/ deconstruction of existing buildings and structures, and/ or parts thereof, including transport from site and waste processing of removed materials.

A5p2.description: Life Cycle Stage A5.2 Construction Activities includes Site preparation; temporary works; ground works; connection to utilities; transport and onsite storage of construction products, materials and equipment; onsite production/assembly of products; works for the installation and ancillary materials (e.g. formworks and their disposal); heating/ cooling/ventilation of site facilities; energy and water use for construction processes and landscaping

A5p3.description: Life Cycle Stage A5.3 Waste and Waste Management includes Production, transportation, storage and end-of-life treatment and disposal of any material/waste onsite; transport, waste management and disposal of packing materials.

A5p4.description: Life Cycle Stage A5.4 Worker Transport includes emissions of site workers traveling to and from site.

B1_total.description: Life Cycle Stage B1 Use Stage

B1p1.description: Life Cycle Stage B1.1 Material Emissions and Uptake

B1p2.description: Life Cycle Stage B1.2 Fugitive Emissions

B2.description: Life Cycle Stage B2 Maintenance Emissions

B3.description: Life Cycle Stage B3 Repair Emissions

B4.description: Life Cycle Stage B4 Replacement Emissions

B5.description: Life Cycle Stage B5 Refurbishment Emissions

B6.description: Life Cycle Stage B6 Operational Energy

B7.description: Life Cycle Stage B7 Operational Water Use

B8.description: Life Cycle Stage B8 Other Operational Processes

C2.description: Life Cycle Stage C2 End-of-Life Transport

C3.description: Life Cycle Stage C3 Waste Processing for Recovery

C4.description: Life Cycle Stage C4 End-of-Life Disposal

D_total.description: Life Cycle Stage D Benefits and loads beyond the system boundary (Reuse, Recovery, Recycling potential).

D1.description: Life Cycle Stage D1 All environmental loads and benedits from future substitution of resources due to reused products, recycled materials, secondary fuelds, and recovered energy leaving a project for use in a subsequent product system as material.

D2.description: Life Cycle Stage D2 All environmental loads and benefits for recovered and exported energy used to meet the energy demand outside of the project.

reduction_baseline.description: If a baseline scenario assessment was conducted, enter the total GWP of the baseline model here.
reduction_baseline.title: Reduction Baseline

reduction_percentage_from_reference.description: Percent reduction from a baseline (if applicable).
reduction_percentage_from_reference.title: Reduction Percentage From Reference

GWP_total.description: Total project GWP in kilograms of CO2 equivalent.
GWP_total.title: Gwp Total

operational_energy_included.description: Is operational energy use reported?  Required.
operational_energy_included.title: Operational Energy Included

biogenic_carbon_storage_included.description: If assessment includes biogenic carbon storage in building materials. Required.
biogenic_carbon_storage_included.title: Biogenic Carbon Storage Included

biogenic_carbon_accounting_method.description: What method was used to calculate biogenic carbon? Recommended.
biogenic_carbon_accounting_method.title: Biogenic Carbon Accounting Method

bio_sustainability_certification.description: 3rd party certification for sourcing of bio-based and forestry products. Recommended.
bio_sustainability_certification.title: Bio Sustainability Certification

biogenic_carbon_description.description: Provide a detailed explanation of the bio-based materials used in the project. Recommended.
biogenic_carbon_description.title: Biogenic Carbon Description

project_refrigerants.description: Does the assessment include impacts from refrigerants? Required.
project_refrigerants.title: Project Refrigerants

substructure_included.description: Is the substructure physical scope included in the reported calculations? Required.
substructure_included.title: Substructure Included

substructure_scope.description: Which substructure components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
substructure_scope.title: Substructure Scope

shell_superstructure_included.description: Is the shell-superstructure physical scope included in the reported calculations?  Required.
shell_superstructure_included.title: Shell Superstructure Included

shell_superstructure_scope.description: Which superstructure components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
shell_superstructure_scope.title: Shell Superstructure Scope

shell_exterior_enclosure_included.description: Is the shell-exterior enclosure physical scope included in the reported calculations? Required.
shell_exterior_enclosure_included.title: Shell Exterior Enclosure Included

shell_exterior_enclosure_scope.description: Which shell-exterior enclosure components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
shell_exterior_enclosure_scope.title: Shell Exterior Enclosure Scope

interior_construction_included.description: Is the interiors - construction physical scope included in the reported calculations? Required.
interior_construction_included.title: Interior Construction Included

interior_construction_scope.description: Which interior construction components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
interior_construction_scope.title: Interior Construction Scope

interiors_finishes_included.description: Is the interiors - finishes physical scope included in the reported calculations? Required.
interiors_finishes_included.title: Interiors Finishes Included

interior_finishes_scope.description: Which interiors - finishes components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
interior_finishes_scope.title: Interior Finishes Scope

services_mep_included.description: Is the services physical scope included in the reported calculations? Required.
services_mep_included.title: Services Mep Included

enum: Ducts and Pipes and Their Insulation

services_mechanical_scope.description: Which mechanical components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
services_mechanical_scope.title: Services Mechanical Scope

enum: Power Management Systems: Uninterrupted Power Supplies

services_electrical_scope.description: Which electrical components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
services_electrical_scope.title: Services Electrical Scope

enum: Pipes Servicing Equipment And Their Insulation
Plumbing Fixtures And Plumbing And Fire Protection Equipment

services_plumbing_scope.description: Which plumbing and fire protection components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
services_plumbing_scope.title: Services Plumbing Scope

sitework_included.description: Is the sitework physical scope included in the reported calculations? Required.
sitework_included.title: Sitework Included

sitework_scope.description: Which sitework components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
sitework_scope.title: Sitework Scope

equipment_included.description: Is equipment included in the reported calculations? Required.
equipment_included.title: Equipment Included

equipment_scope.description: Which equipment components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
equipment_scope.title: Equipment Scope

furnishings_included.description: Are furnishings included in the reported calculations? Required.
furnishings_included.title: Furnishings Included

furnishings_scope.description: Which furnishings components are included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
furnishings_scope.title: Furnishings Scope

infrastructure_components_included.description: Are infrastructure components included in the reported calculations? Recommended.
infrastructure_components_included.title: Infrastructure Components Included

refrigerant_type_included.description: Which refrigerants were utilized on the project and included in the assessment?
refrigerant_type_included.title: Refrigerant Type Included

fossil_gas_leakage.description: Does the assessment include impacts from fossil gas leakage?
fossil_gas_leakage.title: Fossil Gas Leakage

lca_requirements.description: Does the project have to meet GWP and/or other LCA requirements as set forth by project owner, federal or local policy, code, project team or other entity? If so, explain the requirements in detail.
lca_requirements.title: Lca Requirements

assessment_verified.description: Whether or not the assessment has been third-party verified. Recommended.
assessment_verified.title: Assessment Verified

iso21931_compliance.description: Was the assessment conducted in accordance with ISO21931-1:2022?
iso21931_compliance.title: Iso21931 Compliance

en15978_compliance.description: Was the assessment conducted in accordance with EN 15978-1?
en15978_compliance.title: En15978 Compliance

rics_2017_compliance.description: Was the assessment conducted in accordance with RICS Whole Life Carbon Assessment - 1st edition (2017)?
rics_2017_compliance.title: Rics 2017 Compliance

rics_2023_compliance.description: Was the assessment conducted in accordance with RICS Whole Life Carbon Assessment - 2nd edition (2023)?
rics_2023_compliance.title: Rics 2023 Compliance

ashraeicc_240p_compliance.description: Was the assessment conducted in accordance with ASHRAE/ICC Standard 240P Quantification of Life Cycle Greenhouse Gas Emissions in Buildings?
ashraeicc_240p_compliance.title: Ashraeicc 240P Compliance

sei_prestandard_compliance.description: Was the assessment conducted in accordance with the SEI Prestandard for Assessing the Embodied Carbon of Structural Systems for Buildings?
sei_prestandard_compliance.title: Sei Prestandard Compliance

assessment_validity_period.description: Period for which assessment is valid (in years)
assessment_validity_period.title: Assessment Validity Period

results_validation_description.description: How were these results and material quantities validated?
results_validation_description.title: Results Validation Description

assessment_purpose.description: Describe the purpose or goal of the assessment. Per EN 15978, this includes the goal, scope, and intended use, such as reporting to a commitment program, third-party certification, or code compliance. Recommended.
assessment_purpose.title: Assessment Purpose

lcia_method.description: Life Cycle Impact Assessment (LCIA) method used. Recommended.
lcia_method.title: Lcia Method

assessment_uncertainty.description: Describe uncertainty factors in the assessment. Confirm if contingency or data uncertainty factors were applied, and detail which life cycle modules, elements, and/or materials they were applied to. Recommended.
assessment_uncertainty.title: Assessment Uncertainty

assessment_methodology_description.description: Describe the methodology used to conduct the assessment.
assessment_methodology_description.title: Assessment Methodology Description

assessment_cutoff_method.description: Describe the cutoff method used, if any, including the standard if applicable, the type (cost, mass, etc.), and quantity (percentage, specific values, etc.).
assessment_cutoff_method.title: Assessment Cutoff Method

tool_energy_model.description: Tool used to perform the energy modeling. Required if reporting operational energy.
tool_energy_model.title: Tool Energy Model

energy_model_methodology_reference.description: The energy modeling reference standard used. Recommended.
energy_model_methodology_reference.title: Energy Model Methodology Reference

energy_model_tool_version.description: Version of software used for energy modeling. Recommended.
energy_model_tool_version.title: Energy Model Tool Version

gwp_energy_sources_year.description: Basis of the global warming potential for energy sources determined on a 20-year or 100-year basis. Recommended.
gwp_energy_sources_year.title: Gwp Energy Sources Year

site_location_weather_data.description: Weather data information of the site location based on ASHRAE's Weather Data Viewer. Includes weather station name, WMO station identifier, ASHRAE Climate Zone per ASHRAE Standard 169, and the year of accessing the weather file. Recommended.
site_location_weather_data.title: Site Location Weather Data

electricity_provider.description: Name of the electricity source provider. Recommended.
electricity_provider.title: Electricity Provider

electricity_carbon_factor.description: Electricity carbon factor (in kg CO2e/MWh), stated as either a single annualized value or as a list of sub-annual schedule-based values. Recommended.
electricity_carbon_factor.title: Electricity Carbon Factor

electricity_carbon_factor_source.description: State the source of the electricity carbon factor. Recommended.
electricity_carbon_factor_source.title: Electricity Carbon Factor Source

tool_report_upload.description: Upload report from LCA tool. Recommended.
tool_report_upload.title: Tool Report Upload

assessment_year.description: Year when LCA or carbon assessment was completed. Required.
assessment_year.title: Assessment Year

assessment_date.description: Date of assessment. Year must be provided at a minimum. Month and day recommended.
assessment_date.title: Assessment Date

project_phase_at_time_of_assessment.description: Phase of the project when the LCA or carbon assessment was completed. Required.
project_phase_at_time_of_assessment.title: Project Phase At Time Of Assessment

tool_lca.description: Tool used to conduct the assessment. Required.
tool_lca.title: Tool Lca

lca_tool_version_type.description: Version of tool and type used to conduct the assessment. If unknown, enter 'unknown'. Recommended.
lca_tool_version_type.title: Lca Tool Version Type

assessment_life_cycle_stages.description: LCA stages included in embodied carbon modeling. Recommended.
assessment_life_cycle_stages.title: Assessment Life Cycle Stages

required_service_life.description: Service life required by the client or through regulations. Recommended.
required_service_life.title: Required Service Life

reference_study_period.description: Reference study period used in assessment modeling, if use and end of life phases included. Recommended.
reference_study_period.title: Reference Study Period

enum: Extrapolation from Construction Type Land Use Area
Design Estimates/ Manual Takeoff from Design Documentation

material_quantity_source.description: Main source of material quantities. Recommended.
material_quantity_source.title: Material Quantity Source

report_name.description: Filename of the LCA Results. Must be unique.
report_name.title: Report Name

additional_lca_report_name.description: Filename of the additional LCA Results that must be submitted apart from the main LCA Result.
additional_lca_report_name.title: Additional Lca Report Name

assessor_name.description: Name of person who conducted the LCA or carbon assessment.
assessor_name.title: Assessor Name

assessor_email.description: Email of person who conducted the LCA or carbon assessment.
assessor_email.title: Assessor Email

assessor_organization.description: Company, organization or affiliation of person who conducted the LCA or carbon assessment.
assessor_organization.title: Assessor Organization

project_phase_at_reporting.description: The phase of the project when the LCA or carbon assessment was reported to database, commitment, or certification program.
project_phase_at_reporting.title: Project Phase At Reporting

material_quantity_source_detail.description: If more than one material quantity source selected, provide additional detail on which materials and systems apply to each material quantity source.
material_quantity_source_detail.title: Material Quantity Source Detail

system_column_grid_long.description: Typical column grid spacing in the long direction in feet. Recommended.
system_column_grid_long.title: System Column Grid Long

enum: III (buildings with a substantial risk to cause economic impact and/or mass disruption)
IV (buildings and other structures designated as essential facilities or the failure of which could pose a substantial hazard to the community)

system_risk_category.description: Project Risk Category based on IBC definition. Recommended.
system_risk_category.title: System Risk Category

system_snow_load.description: Code-determined ground snow load in pounds per square foot or square meter. Recommended.
system_snow_load.title: System Snow Load

system_wind_speed_asce7.description: Code-determined ultimate wind speed in miles per hour or km per hour, per ASCE 7-16. Recommended.
system_wind_speed_asce7.title: System Wind Speed Asce7

earthquake_importance_factor.description: Earthquake Importance Factor, per National Building Code of Canada, 2020 table 4.1.8.5. Recommended.
earthquake_importance_factor.title: Earthquake Importance Factor

seismic_design_category_ibc.description: Seismic design category, as determined by IBC. Recommended.
seismic_design_category_ibc.title: Seismic Design Category Ibc

enum: Steel: Frame + Concrete on Metal Deck

system_allowable_soil_bearing_pressure.description: Allowable soil bearing pressure, as reported by the geotechnical engineer.
system_allowable_soil_bearing_pressure.title: System Allowable Soil Bearing Pressure

system_live_load.description: Typical floor live load in pounds per square foot or square meter.
system_live_load.title: System Live Load

enum: Steel: Frame + Concrete on Metal Deck
Primary system defined above is on a podium
Primary system defined above is a podium

system_podium.description: Whether or not project is podium construction.
system_podium.title: System Podium

currency_code.description: Local currency alphabetic code per ISO 4217. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217
currency_code.title: Currency Code

total_cost.description: Total Project Cost in the specified currency.
total_cost.title: Total Cost

hard_cost.description: Hard costs include building materials and total construction cost.
hard_cost.title: Hard Cost

soft_cost.description: Soft costs include design/consultant fees, overhead, and project administration costs.
soft_cost.title: Soft Cost

siteworks_cost.description: Estimated cost of siteworks for the project.
siteworks_cost.title: Siteworks Cost

cost_source.description: Whether the cost is estimated, based on the initial contract value (BId), or actual including change orders (COs).
cost_source.title: Cost Source

cost_notes.description: Open field to provide additional details or context related to project costs.
cost_notes.title: Cost Notes

project_units.description: The preferred units this project was entered in. This field has no effect on the data formats, but is useful in restoring the original units when displaying buildings.
project_units.title: Project Units

gfa_measurement_method.description: Method used to calculate the gross floor area.
enum: BOMA 2018 Gross Areas: Standard methods of Measurement (ANSI/BOMA Z65.3-2018)
gfa_measurement_method.title: Gfa Measurement Method

gross_floor_area.description: Gross floor area (GFA) associated with the selected usage type. Required if project type is building.
gross_floor_area.title: Gross Floor Area

project_site_area.description: Total area within the legal property boundaries of a site. Recommended.
project_site_area.title: Project Site Area

building_footprint_area.description: Area of the building footprint, excluding hardscapes, landscapes, and other site works.
building_footprint_area.title: Building Footprint Area

conditioned_floor_area.description: The floor area within the building that is conditioned. Recommended if reporting operational carbon.
conditioned_floor_area.title: Conditioned Floor Area

unconditioned_floor_area.description: The floor area within the building that is not conditioned. Recommended if reporting operational carbon.
unconditioned_floor_area.title: Unconditioned Floor Area

enclosed_parking_area.description: Parking area located inside the building shell. Recommended.
enclosed_parking_area.title: Enclosed Parking Area

detached_parking_area.description: Parking area that is not attached to the building shell. Recommended.
detached_parking_area.title: Detached Parking Area

stories_above_grade.description: Number of stories above grade. Recommended.
stories_above_grade.title: Stories Above Grade

stories_below_grade.description: Number of stories below grade. Recommended.
stories_below_grade.title: Stories Below Grade

building_height.description: Total height of the building above finished ground level, per ASCE 7-16. Recommended.
building_height.title: Building Height

surface_parking_area.description: Refers to an open, ground-level parking facility where vehicles are parked directly on a paved surface. This type of parking area is not enclosed within a building and does not include structured parking, such as multi-level parking garages or underground parking facilities.
surface_parking_area.title: Surface Parking Area

detached_parking_structure_area.description: Refers to the area of a parking facility that is physically separated from the main building or structure it serves. This type of parking structure is typically a standalone facility, such as a parking garage, that is not directly attached to the main building by structural elements like walls or roofs.
detached_parking_structure_area.title: Detached Parking Structure Area

interstitial_floors.description: The number of floors located between the main floors of the building, often used for mechanical systems or storage.
interstitial_floors.title: Interstitial Floors

window_wall_ratio.description: The ratio of the window area to the gross exterior wall area.
window_wall_ratio.title: Window Wall Ratio

thermal_envelope_area.description: The thermal envelope of a building includes all the exterior surfaces that enclose the conditioned space and separate it from unconditioned spaces or the outdoors. This includes walls, floors, roofs, windows, and doors. The thermal envelope area is crucial for determining the energy efficiency of a building, as it impacts heat loss and gain.
thermal_envelope_area.title: Thermal Envelope Area

building_construction_type.description: Select the appropriate building construction type.
building_construction_type.title: Building Construction Type

building_use_type.description: The usage type. Required if project type is building.
enum: Food Sales: Convenience Store (w/ or w/out gas station)
building_use_type.title: Building Use Type

infrastructure_use_type.description: The infrastructure project usage type. If more than one option is applicable, select more than one.
infrastructure_use_type.title: Infrastructure Use Type

omniclass_table_11_construction_entity.description: Options per Level 1: Refer to the OmniClass Table 11 Construction Entities by Function.
omniclass_table_11_construction_entity.title: Omniclass Table 11 Construction Entity

IBC_Construction_Type.description: Construction Type per IBC. Optional with submission of Architectural Project Documents with General Notes.
IBC_Construction_Type.title: Ibc Construction Type

project_surroundings.description: Type of area surrounding the asset.
project_surroundings.title: Project Surroundings

development_site_type.description: Identifies whether the lot being developed is a greenfield or brownfield site.
development_site_type.title: Development Site Type

project_historic.description: Whether or not the asset is of historical/cultural value.
project_historic.title: Project Historic

occupant_load.description: Number of people permitted to occupy the asset. Must be greater than 0.
occupant_load.title: Occupant Load

full_time_equivalent.description: Full-Time Equivalent (FTE). Represents the number of regular building occupants who spend 40 hours per week. Calculated as Total Occupant Hours ÷ 8.
full_time_equivalent.title: Full Time Equivalent

residential_units.description: Number of residential units (if a residential asset).
residential_units.title: Residential Units

anticipated_start_building_occupancy.description: Anticipated Start of Occupancy (letter of occupancy) (yyyy-mm-dd).
anticipated_start_building_occupancy.title: Anticipated Start Building Occupancy

bedroom_count.description: Enter the number of bedrooms (if residential asset). Count bedroom units in studios as 0.5 and count 1 bedroom + den units as 1.5.
bedroom_count.title: Bedroom Count

project_construction_date_completion.description: Expected or actual construction end date (yyyy-mm-dd).
project_construction_date_completion.title: Project Construction Date Completion

project_status.description: Project status at time of data submission.
project_status.title: Project Status

project_construction_date_start.description: Anticipated construction start date in ISO format (yyyy-mm-dd).
project_construction_date_start.title: Project Construction Date Start

project_construction_date_existing_build.description: Year original asset was constructed for existing buildings (ISO Date or just year).
project_construction_date_existing_build.title: Project Construction Date Existing Building

project_owner_contact_first_name.description: First name of the owner contact.
project_owner_contact_first_name.title: Project Owner Contact First Name

project_owner_contact_last_name.description: Last name of the owner contact.
project_owner_contact_last_name.title: Project Owner Contact Last Name

owner_organization.description: Name of the owner's organization or company.
owner_organization.title: Owner Organization

owner_country.description: Location of owner headquarters (country), as ISO3166-Alpha3.
owner_country.title: Owner Country

owner_email.description: Email address of the owner or primary contact.
owner_email.title: Owner Email

owner_type.description: Type of owner (e.g., Government, Corporate, Non-Profit).
owner_type.title: Owner Type

owners_representative.description: Name of the owner's representative organization.
owners_representative.title: Owners Representative

architect_of_record.description: Organization serving as the Architect of Record (AOR).
architect_of_record.title: Architect Of Record

org_office.description: Studio or office within the firm organization.
org_office.title: Org Office

date_of_update.description: Date of last data entry or edit (yyyy-mm-dd)
date_of_update.title: Date Of Update

pluscode.description: Absolute Open Location Code of this location (requires either lat long or open location code)
pluscode.title: Pluscode

project_state_or_province.description: Project state, province, or country subdivision
project_state_or_province.title: Project State Or Province

project_postal_code.description: Project postal code (only first 3 digits required for Canada)
project_postal_code.title: Project Postal Code

lat.description: Latitude, as a signed decimal (-90 ≤ value ≤ 90)
lat.title: Lat

lng.description: Longitude, as a signed decimal (-180 ≤ value ≤ 180)
lng.title: Lng

project_description.description: A brief description of the project.
project_description.title: Project Description

project_image.description: Path or URL to the project image or rendering.
project_image.title: Project Image

data_entry_contact_first_name.description: First name of the person submitting the data.
data_entry_contact_first_name.title: Data Entry Contact First Name

data_entry_contact_last_name.description: Last name of the person submitting the data.
data_entry_contact_last_name.title: Data Entry Contact Last Name

data_entry_contact_email.description: Email address of the person submitting the data.
data_entry_contact_email.title: Data Entry Contact Email

governing_code.description: Local or state building code, or IBC/IRC version if no local code exists.
governing_code.title: Governing Code

project_data_anonymized.description: Specifies if the project data has been anonymized.
project_data_anonymized.title: Project Data Anonymized

project_certifications_commitments.description: List of third-party certifications or commitment programs the project is pursuing.
project_certifications_commitments.title: Project Certifications Commitments
